fgeo.tool 0.0.0.9003
  • Reference
  • fgeo

Reference

Functions to import/export data

read_vft() read_taxa()

Read text files containing ViewFullTable and ViewTaxonomy tables.

dfs_to_csv()

Save each dataframe in a list to a different .csv file.

csv_to_df() csv_to_dfs() xl_to_df() xl_to_dfs()

Read all .csv or flat excel files from a directory into dataframes.

Edit data in place

sanitize_vft() sanitize_taxa()

Sanitize ViewFullTable and ViewTaxonomy.

convert_unit() convert_unit_at()

Convert units of a vector or columns of a dataframe.

fill_na()

Fill NA's with a single filler.

lookup()

recode() by looking up old and new values (from a lookup table).

standardize_at()

Divide (standardize) columns of a dataframe by a constant denominator.

to_tidy_names()

Create a names-friendly version of a string (lowercase and with no spaces).

Pick/drop rows with matching conditions

filter_status() drop_dead_stem() drop_dead_tree()

Filter a (fgeo) dataframe by the status of each stem or tree.

pick_dbh_min() pick_dbh_max() pick_dbh_under() pick_dbh_over() pick_status() drop_status()

Pick and drop rows of a ForestGEO ViewFullTable or census table.

pick_main_stem() pick_main_stemid()

Pick the main stem or main stemid(s) of each tree in each census.

pick_recensus()

Identify stems to recensus.

pick_top()

Filter a data set by matching n values from the head (or tail) of a variable.

Add new columns

add_id()

Add a new id column to a dataframe by pasting values of preexisting columns.

add_status_tree()

Define the status of a tree based on the status of its stems.

add_subquad()

Add a quadrat variable to a dataframe based based on qx and qy coordinates.

add_lxly() add_qxqy() add_index() add_col_row() add_hectindex() add_quad() add_col_row2()

Add columns lx, ly; qx, qy; index; colrow; and hectindex to ForestGEO data.

Guess grid size and plot dimensions

extract_gridsize() extract_plotdim()

Extract plot dimensions from habitat data.

Transform lists to dataframes

to_df(<demography_lst>) to_df(<demography_lst_by>)

Dataframe objects of class "demography_lst" and "demography_lst_by".

to_df(<krig_lst>)

Dataframe objects of class "krig_lst".

to_df(<tt_lst>)

Dataframe objects of class "tt_lst".

Create different classes of ForestGEO data

fgeo_elevation()

Construct elevation data.

fgeo_habitat()

Construct habitat data from measures of topography.

fgeo_topography()

Calculate mean elevation, convexity and slope.

Objects exported from other packages

reexports

Objects exported from other packages
